author: aeberbac
msg: Fix for proxy generation, this fixes the property referencing code.

author: mrglavas
msg: Performance: Every time the XMLGrammarPreparser is invoked it sets several
properties on the XMLGrammarLoader. This forces components to read the whole
config on every parse when they could otherwise break after examining the
PARSER_SETTINGS feature. Instead of setting these properties every time, first
check if their values have changed since the last time they were applied to

author: scotsmatrix
msg: DERBY-2361: Added the new attribute for securityMechanism was added, examples improved, and topic titles clarified. Patch derby-2361-4.diff contributed by Kim Haase.

author: alally
msg: Fix bug in XMI out-of-typesystem support, which could cause serialized XMI to have
multiple FS with the same xmi:id.
